The image was posted on Facebook on May: 2. The image shows a section of an article on a website called worldhealth.net, with a bullet point circled in red claiming that people who get flu shots will be the first to die in a global pandemic.

Global health agencies, including the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and Australia’s Department of Health, have stated that flu vaccinations strengthen people's immune systems and there is no evidence that the flu vaccine makes people more vulnerable to the novel coronavirus.
